name: Wanderer (CptFinn)
description:
Story:
You have been left behind by your settlement from your latest mission...

You will have to wander the desert, find resources, build temporary bases and eventually leave them behind to get to your settlement.

But in the night lurks evil...

Controls

WASD - Move the player

1, 2, 3 - Select building to build (Wood Wall, Metal Wall, Turret)

LMB - To place a building
